content: scrap size frog lc s crochet lab scrap size frog lc s crochet lab pattern overview this pattern is for a small amigurumi frog about 2 tall this is a very small pattern so stitches may be hard to work into at times especially the arms which use a magic_ring of 4 this pattern is worked in continuous rounds spirals using the normal yarn over single_crochet i recommend reading the pattern notes and tips section for advice and modifications on connecting the eye and body materials 4 mm g hook worsted weight yarn- 2 colors one for body and one for stomach 6 mm safety eyes poly fil/stuffing tapestry needle scissors recommended stitch markers stitch and terminology guide this pattern is written with us terminology slip_stitch = slip_stitch st = stitch chain = chain mc = magic_ring single_crochet = single_crochet fsc = foundation single_crochet invdec = invisible decrease increase = increase two single_crochet in one stitch x n = repeat what s in the brackets n times # at end of row/round = # of stitches in that round pattern by lc s crochet lab lcscrochetlab com 1 pattern notes and tips attaching eye and body alternative if you prefer you can replace rounds 2 and 3 as below in order to use foundation single crochets instead of a chain to connect the eye to the body round 2 single_crochet 3 fsc 2 single_crochet 6 around eye single_crochet 2 in the other side of the fsc 2 single_crochet 3 around first eye 14 round 3 single_crochet 16 16 4 stitch magic_ring magic circles of 4 stitches can be tricky to work into for the first round or difficult to flip right side out after a few rounds here s how i approach them i ll do the first 2 stitches in the round after the magic_ring then force the circle right side out then i ll work the final 2 stitches of the round at this point the piece won t be able to easily flip the other way again pattern by lc s crochet lab lcscrochetlab com 2 pattern eye make 1 in body color round 1 single_crochet 6 in mc then cut yarn and finish off 6 body make 1 in body color round 1 single_crochet 6 in mc 6 round 2 single_crochet 3 chain 2 single_crochet 6 around eye single_crochet 2 in the other side of the chain 2 single_crochet 3 around first eye 14 round 3 single_crochet 3 single_crochet 2 in other side of the chain 2 single_crochet 11 16 rounds 4-6 single_crochet 16 16 round 7 single_crochet 3 increase single_crochet 2 increase single_crochet 9 18 center incs at the back of the body add eyes between row 2 and 3 on the opposite side of the increases in the row you just worked round 8 single_crochet 18 round 9 single_crochet 13 invdec 2 single_crochet center invdecs at the front of the body 16 begin stuffing round 10 single_crochet 2 invdec x 4 12 round 11
